sentence.Network_en: The sulfide assemlage consists largely of pyrrhotite, pentlandite, chalcopyrite, and pyrite.
sentence.Network_cn: 硫化物集体大部由磁黄铁矿 、 镍黄铁矿 、 黄铜矿及黄铁矿组成.

sentence.Network_en: Raman spectrum analyses shows a different Raman shift outline from the common pentlandite ( cubic ).
sentence.Network_cn: 拉曼光谱分析表明,其拉曼位移有别于一般的镍黄铁矿 ( 立方对称 ).

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...产地产状产状磁黄铁矿在各类型的内生矿床中均可见到，基性岩体内的铜钼硫化物岩浆成因矿床，是磁矿铁矿的主要成因。常与黄铜矿(chalcopyrite)、镍黄铁矿(pentlandite。是一种重要的镍矿矿石)共生.
penthouse 安全台pentlandite 硫镍铁矿peptisation 胶溶酌

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from the name of Joseph B. Pentland (1797–1873), Irish traveller, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a mineral (iron-nickel sulphide) that is the chief ore of nickel
